name: matchpoint
description: MatchPoint is a comprehensive tennis match prediction platform that combines machine learning models with a modern web application to predict tennis match outcomes. The project consists of three main components: a React frontend, a Node.js backend API, and a Python FastAPI machine learning service.

scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../model && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd model && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd model && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
